actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide individuals and businesses a refundable credit against income tax for the expenses of purchasing and installing fire and natural gas detectors in residential dwellings.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a refundable income tax credit for a percentage of the cost of purchasing and installing fire and gas detectors.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide individuals and businesses a refundable credit against income tax for the expenses of purchasing and installing fire and natural gas detectors in residential dwellings.
